documentation.text:
INTERFACES
Interfaces cannot inherit from other smart contract, they can only inherit from
other interfaces. Interfaces can also not declare a contructor, nor declare variables.
All declared variables have to be external.

userdoc.notice: INTERFACES Interfaces cannot inherit from other smart contract, they can only inherit from other interfaces. Interfaces can also not declare a contructor, nor declare variables. All declared variables have to be external.
